about_the_game:
Get the full Aquarist game, which is needed to play this DLC.

Aquarist have just come out of Early Access but that doesn't stop us from expanding the game and adding new content to it. Japanese Garden is the first DLC which greatly extends the game and gives more of what we love in Aquarist.

In this DLC, the player receives access to a completely new location that expands his aquarium empire, i.e. the Japanese garden.

🐟AQUARIST - JAPANESE GARDEN DLC CONTENT🐟


ADDED:

  • 18 new fish, mainly in the Japanese style (various types of pond carps such as Tancho Koi, Kohaku Koi, etc., various types of Japanese fish such as ryukin goldfish, pearlscale, etc. and others!)
  • 20 new Japanese-themed decorations to be unlocked
  • New largest and most beautiful location allows us to renovate a neglected Japanese garden and restore it to its former glory
  • New decorations and plants floating on the water's surface
  • New tunnel where you can prepare 4 large aquariums that can be admired by visitors
  • Hidden place where a unique reward awaits you. Discover the Buddha's secrets, unlock the map and find access to it
  • New Patio at the exhibition level, where we can prepare our first small open tank at an early stage of the game and further improve this location.
  • 2 new achievements to obtain


The player must clean up the locations, repair broken elements of the park, collect materials and build classic buildings - obligatory elements of Japanese parks (a bridge over a lake, a pagoda on the water and a Japanese shelter). The player has access to 5 ponds of different sizes and shapes, which he must decorate appropriately to attract as many visitors as possible, earn extra money and provide a good life for his new fish. In this location, you can afford great decorations and arrange them freely, the only thing blocking you is your creativity!

🐟🐢🦈🐙🐬

movies.name: Aquarist - Japanese Garden DLC Announcement Trailer

name: Aquarist - Japanese Garden DLC
short_description: Japanese Garden DLC is all that you love Aquarist for and so much more. The largest and most beautiful location comes with a plethora of new fish🐟🐠, decorations🖼️, plants🍀, and other interesting additions. Get it and start your aquarist relax in Japanese style.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
